publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: Differences in matters of religion, betweene the easterne and westerne churches : VVherein the Romane Church may see her selfe charged with as many errours, as shee falsly layeth to the charge of other churches in Europe. Gathered by Irenæus Rodoginus
monogr.author: Rodoginus, Irenaeus

lg.l: HEere faults escap'd I haue amended,
But if thou wilt: then whose to blame
Thy fostred faults if others name?

div.p: In the Preface. For rigorous, read vigorous. In C. read magis diligentiam. for Crow, r. Crane. for Iekan, r. Iehan. for critticke, r. crypticke, for vntie, r. vntied. Page 3. in marg. for Loe, r. Leo. for lib. r. sub. p. 8. line 11. for the, r. thy. p. 13. l. 14. for our, r. one. p. 14. l. 12. for Barnious, r. Baronius, pa 15. l. 3. for chiefe, r. cheefe. l. 26. for fish, r. fist. pag. 17. l. 3. r. to the Sea. lin 24. for concimantes, r. concinnantes pag. 18. li. 4. for iudice, r. i • dice. p. 20. l. 10. for worteh, r. wotthy. p. 36. l. 5. for coffin, r. coffer. pa. 37. l. 1. for Synod at, r. Synodall. for no, r. to.
